Top-3 Similar Questions: au_538570: How to enable disable touchpad from double-clicking on its special area
Top-3 Scripts:
au_538570: #!/bin/bash

if [ -e /tmp/mouse-disabled ]; then
  rm -f /tmp/mouse-disabled
  xinput enable [id]
else
  touch /tmp/mouse-disabled
  xinput disable [id]
fi;
